nodes.text: The horned krevol was a small territorial insect that has a large horn on its head. It lived on the planet Naboo and its moon Rori, as well as Corellia.
Krevols appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
